newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Devex seeks one mln oz gold resource.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Devex seeks one mln oz gold resource.

text.p: Australian gold miner Devex Ltd said on Monday its objective is to increase its gold resources to more than one million ounces within two years by stepping up exploration.
Devex is working to redevelop the old Gympie Eldorado gold deposit of south-east Queensland, which produced about 100 tonnes of gold before being abandoned in 1927 after 60 years in operation.
In 1995/96, the company increased the underground mine's ore reserves to 127,000 ounces of contained gold from 27,000 ounces formerly, it said.
The company earlier on Monday reported net profit of A$5.14 million in 1995/1996, up from A$3.81 million in the previous year.
